project-challenges: Learning the Instagram API and the open-source javascript framework, instafeed.js.
project-purpose: The site pulls images and their respective descriptions directly from the clients Instagram feed, organized by the uses of specific hashtags. Among other uses, the site is also fully responsive and displays general information.
project-inspiration: A friend needed a Website & CMS (content management system) to showcase and manage ongoing puppy sales as part of her home-based business. To avoid the weight and workload that comes with building a unique CMS, I instead created an image and description feed that populates directly from her Instagram account, using the Instagram API.
project-accomplishments: Successfully found a workaround for a CMS for this particular instance. Avoided the need for large resource demands such as time and money.
project-subtitle: A responsive 'for sale' website showcasing pups via an Instagram-API driven image feed
